Plot: A young detective goes undercover at an elite private school to destroy an international stolen car ring.
Title: Underclassman
Writer: Brent Goldberg (story), David Wagner (story), Nick Cannon (story), David Wagner (screenplay), Brent Goldberg (screenplay)
Actors: Nick Cannon, Adrian Young, Art Bonilla, Bart McCarthy
tomatoConsensus: Despite the appealing presence of Nick Cannon, Underclassman is a shopworn Beverly Hills Cop/ 21 Jump Street knockoff.
